unhollowerErrors.error:
We do not support the use of MelonLoader on Phasmophobia,
 nor does Phasmophobia support MelonLoader.
Please remove MelonLoader, Mods, Plugins, UserData, NOTICE.txt, version.dll, and dobby.dll.

You are missing the required .NET Framework for MelonLoader.
Please make sure to install it using the following link: <https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet-framework/net48>.

The access to a file has been denied. Please make sure the game is closed when installing MelonLoader, or try restarting your computer. If this doesn't work, try running the MelonLoader Installer with administrator privileges.

unhollowerErrors.regex: System.IO.IOException: The process cannot access the file '(?<filename>.*)'.*
unhollowerErrors.error: Access to file `filename` has been blocked. Please make sure the game or whatever has the file open is closed, or try restarting your computer. If this doesn't work, try running with administrator privileges and make sure your Virus scanner isn't interfering.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] System.IO.IOException: The process cannot access the file.*
unhollowerErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to open a required file. Most likely, your virus scanner is still scanning MelonLoader during execution or the user running MelonLoader does not have access. Try MelonLoader again, restarting your PC, or reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.
Access is denied. Make sure that your Virus scanner is not blocking or removing MelonLoader files and try reinstalling MelonLoader.
Access is denied. Make sure that your file permissions are set correctly. Try restarting your PC and whitelisting in your Virus scanner and reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*Operation did not complete successfully because the file contains a virus or potentially unwanted software.*
unhollowerErrors.error: Virus Scanner blocked MelonLoader. Please whitelist MelonLoader folder and try again or reinstall MelonLoader.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*SHA512 Hash from Temp File does not match Repo Hash!
unhollowerErrors.error: Installer failed to download MelonLoader successfully. Try again later or redownload the [official MelonLoader installer](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe).

unhollowerErrors.regex: Failed to get SHA512 Hash from Repo!
unhollowerErrors.error: Installer failed to download MelonLoader Hash. Try again later or redownload the [official MelonLoader installer](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe).
The access to a file has been denied. Please try starting the game with administrator privileges, or try restarting your computer (failed to save AssemblyGenerator/config.cfg)
The access to a file has been denied. Please try starting the game with administrator privileges, or try restarting your computer (failed to setup directories)

MelonLoader assembly generation failed. Please delete the `MelonLoader` folder, `version.dll`, and dobby.dll file from your game folder, and install MelonLoader $MLRelease$ again (failed to download Il2CppDumper)

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[INTERNAL FAILURE] Failed to Execute Assembly Generator!
unhollowerErrors.error: The assembly generation failed. This is most likely caused by your anti-virus. Add an exception or disable it, then try again. If that wasn't the issue then try accessing [this site](https://api.melonloader.com/api/v1/game/) and tell us if it loads.
GameAssembly is missing. Please verify the integrity of your game, and try again.
The assembly generation failed. Please update MelonLoader to $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Unhandled Exception: System\.IO\.IOException: There is not enough space on the disk\.
unhollowerErrors.error: The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again. You need at least 500MB free.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*---> System.IO.IOException: There is not enough space on the disk.
unhollowerErrors.error: The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again. You need at least 450MB free.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Unhandled Exception: System\.Collections\.Generic\.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary\.
unhollowerErrors.error: Key Not Found. This is most likely caused by your anti-virus. Add an exception or disable it, then reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] ERROR: Can't use auto mode to process file, try manual mode.
unhollowerErrors.error: Il2CppDumper generation failed. Please verify the integrity of your game or reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.
Missing Mono Directory. Please verify the integrity of your game or reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[INTERNAL FAILURE] Failed to Open Mono Assembly!
unhollowerErrors.error: Failed to Open Mono Assembly. Please make sure that the path is free of special characters and `'`.
Missing MelonLoader/MelonLoader.dll. Please do not move it and whitelist it in your virus scanner.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[INTERNAL FAILURE] Failed to Open Preload Assembly!
unhollowerErrors.error: Missing or currupt `MelonLoader\Dependencies\SupportModules\Preload.dll`. Please reinstall MelonLoader $MLRelease$ or whitelist it in your virus scanner.
Ran into obfuscation issues. Please update [MelonLoader](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe) to $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] Can't download Unity Dependencies, Unstripping will NOT be done!
unhollowerErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to download Unity Dependencies. There may be an issue with your firewall or your ISP is blocking the download.
AssemblyGenerator missing. Please reinstall MelonLoader or whitelist MelonLoader in your virus scanner.
Failed to contact MelonLoader API. Please make sure MelonLoader is allowed in your Firewall and that you are using MelonLoader $MLRelease$.
CPP2IL needs to be updated. Please update MelonLoader to latest [nightly release](https://nightly.link/LavaGang/MelonLoader/workflows/build/alpha-development).

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[Il2CppAssemblyGenerator] \[ERROR] Unhandled Exception: .*System.OverflowException: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow.
unhollowerErrors.error: Something in Windows is fucked. Could maybe be caused by changing Window's language. IDK solution but someone fixed by reinstalling Windows.
AutoWebProxyScriptEngine Error. Please open Window's "Change Proxy Settings" setting and disable all three toggles. Type `!proxy` if you need more help.
SocketException. Please open Window's "Change Proxy Settings" setting and disable all three toggles. Type `!proxy` if you need more help.
<@102450956045668352> There has been an issue while running Cpp2IL. Please reupload this log into the [MelonLoader discord](https://discord.gg/2Wn3N2P).
<@102450956045668352> There has been an issue while running Cpp2IL. Please reupload this log into the [MelonLoader discord](https://discord.gg/2Wn3N2P).
Outdated MelonLoader. Please update MelonLoader to $MLRelease$.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] System\.IO\.InvalidDataException: Central Directory corrupt\. ---> System\.IO\.IOException: Attempted to Seek before the beginning of the stream
unhollowerErrors.error: Failed to unzip. Make sure that MelonLoader can download zips successfully, try deleting corrupted zip, and that a antivirus is not corrupting it.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*The WOF driver encountered a corruption in the compressed file's Resource Table.
unhollowerErrors.error: WOF driver error. You may have a corrupt Windows install and you should try validating. [Article on how to](https://www.thewindowsclub.com/the-wof-driver-encountered-a-corruption-in-the-compressed-files-resource-table-dism-error) as well as a video at the bottom.
Some foreign files are causing issues. Please remove everything that you don't see in the image below.$cleanunity$

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'HarmonyLib.AccessTools' threw an exception.*
unhollowerErrors.error: IPA or something else is conflicting with MelonLoader. Please remove everything that you don't see in the image below.$cleanunity$
No Support Module Loaded. Assembly Generation most likely failed. Please reinstall MelonLoader or whitelist MelonLoader in your virus scanner.
Out of RAM. Make sure that you are using the correct version of MelonLoader and that you have plenty of RAM.

unhollowerErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] System.Net.WebException: The remote server returned an error: \(404\) Not Found.
unhollowerErrors.error: Something failed to download. Make sure nothing is blocking downloads and try again later.
Something is broken in MelonLoader. Try reinstalling MelonLoader. If that doesn't work, try cleaning your game install by removing everything that you don't see in the image below.$cleanunity$

Failed to execute Cpp2IL. Downgrade to proton 5, re-setup the `version` library in protontricks, run the game once, then switch back to default proton. Alternatively, you can try to change the launch commands in steam to `PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%`, though this isn't tested.

Failed to find some dependancies. If using Proton, please downgrade to proton 5, re-setup the `version` library in protontricks, run the game once, then switch back to default proton. Alternatively, you can try to change the launch commands in steam to `PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%`, though this isn't tested.

unhollowerErrors.previousLineRegex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Unhandled Exception: System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
unhollowerErrors.error: AssemblyUnhollower NRE. Please reinstall MelonLoader and make sure that a virus scanner is not removing files.

Failed to Initialize Assets Manager. If you are using Turkish as your main Windows language, That could be the problem. It is fixed in the next release of MelonLoader so feel free to use the [nightly build](https://nightly.link/LavaGang/MelonLoader/workflows/build/alpha-development/MelonLoader.x64.CI.Release.zip).

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*ExecutionEngineException: String conversion error: Illegal byte sequence encounted in the input.
unhollowerErrors.error: Illegal char in path. Please remove any double byte characters from the path like Japanese or ü.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*il2cpp_init detour failed: One of the dependent libraries is missing.
unhollowerErrors.error: Missing .NET 6.0. Please install [.NET Runtime 6.0](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/6.0#runtime-6.0.20).

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*Please make sure you have installed the .NET 6.0 runtime.
unhollowerErrors.error: Please make sure you have installed the [.NET Runtime 6.0](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/6.0#runtime-6.0.20).

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*il2cpp_init detour failed: It was not possible to find a compatible framework version.
unhollowerErrors.error: Wrong version of .NET is installed. Make sure to use x64 version for x64 games and x86 for x86 games. Please install [.NET Runtime 6.0](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/6.0#runtime-6.0.20).

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*Failed to initialize MelonLoader: Failed to load library!
unhollowerErrors.error: Failed to load library. Please make sure that path is free of special characters and `'`. Also make sure that a virus scanner is not removing files.

unhollowerErrors.regex: .*Failed to initialize MelonLoader: Failed to get function pointer: (?<thepointer>.*)
unhollowerErrors.error: Failed to get function pointer thepointer. It is likely the game devs removed it to prevent modding.

knownErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[INTERNAL FAILURE] Failed to Read Unity Version from File Info or globalgamemanagers!
knownErrors.error: MelonLoader failed to read your Unity version and game name. Please update MelonLoader to $MLRelease$ or delete UnityCrashHandler64.exe.
Mod config has became nulled. Please delete `game\UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg`
Mod config has Unescaped Char. Please fix `game` on line number `linenumber`

knownErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] Settings load failed: System\.InvalidOperationException: The document has errors:.*
knownErrors.error: Mod config has been corrupted. Please delete `UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg`
Mod config has invalid escape sequence. Please delete `UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg`

knownErrors.regex: .*Il2CppAssemblyGenerator\\Config\.cfg: Tomlet.Exceptions.(TomlEOFException|TomlEndOfFileException): Found unexpected EOF on line (?<linenumber>\d+) when parsing TOML file
knownErrors.error: Config has been corrupted or empty as it ends on line linenumber. Please remove MelonLoader\Dependencies\Il2CppAssemblyGenerator\Config.cfg

knownErrors.regex: .*UserData\\MelonPreferences\.\w{3,4}: Tomlet.Exceptions.(TomlEOFException|TomlEndOfFileException): Found unexpected EOF on line (?<linenumber>\d+) when parsing TOML file
knownErrors.error: Mod config has been corrupted or empty as it ends on line linenumber. Please remove UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg
Mod config has Invalid Values. Try removing UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg to regenerate config.

knownErrors.regex: .*Expecting a newline character at the end of a statement on line \d+, but found an unexpected ','
knownErrors.error: Please either delete `UserData\MelonPreferences.cfg` which will reset mod settings or manually replace all commas (`,`) in numbers with periods (`.`)
The storage space is full. Please free some space and try your game again.

knownErrors.regex: System.IO.InvalidDataException: Central Directory corrupt. ---> System.IO.IOException: An attempt was made to move the file pointer before the beginning of the file.
knownErrors.error: Please redownload the installer from [GitHub](https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader.Installer/releases/latest/download/MelonLoader.Installer.exe) and try to install ML with it.
Please do not move CVRModUpdater.Core.dll out of your `ChilloutVR\UserData` folder.
Please do not move the MelonLoader zip into your Mods/Plugins folder! Follow the provided tutorial on how to install MelonLoader or ask for help.
Please use forward slashes (`/`) in MelonPreferences.cfg
An invalid/broken mod attempted to load.
Please do not put the source zip in the Mods/Plugins folder. Either use the provided dll or compile the source yourself.
Cpp2IL failed to save generated dll, please make sure that a virus scanner is not blocking MelonLoader and that MelonLoader has write permissions.

knownErrors.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] System\.Reflection\.TargetInvocationException: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation\. ---> System\.IO\.DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path .*\.tmp"\.
knownErrors.error: Temp folder does not exist. Please follow these directions to change your [temp folder](https://www.digitalriser.com/change-windows-temporary-folders-location.html).

DNS failed to resolve. Please set your Window's settings to use [CloudFlare](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/setup/windows/) or [Google](https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using#windows) DNS servers.
Do not leave zips in Mod/Plugin folder. Remove the zip and try again.

knownErrors.regex: .*(?<error>Please Make Sure Mod DLL Name Is .*)
knownErrors.error: Mod name is incorrect

knownErrors.regex: WARNING!! Your game version seems too old to this MOD!
knownErrors.error: Your game version seems too old to a mod

knownErrors.nextLineRegex: .*Assembly with same name is already loaded
knownErrors.error: You have a duplicate mod installed. Please remove modname and try again.
Uninstall MelonLoader and remove the MelonLoader folder if left behind, then re-install it.

BloonsTD6.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ERROR] System.ArgumentException: No target method specified for class NKHook6.*
BloonsTD6.error: NKHook6 is no longer working. Please remove NKHook6 from your Mods folder.

BloonsTD6.regex: .*is already injected. Don't inject the same type twice, or use a different namespace
BloonsTD6.error: 2 mods are conflicting with each other because they use the same namespace. (this is a common problem with datjanedoe's old mods).
Failed to register component. Try removing it.

BONEWORKS.error: Please replace Boneworks Modding Toolkit with [ModThatIsNotMod](https://boneworks.thunderstore.io/package/gnonme/ModThatIsNotMod/).
No Melon files found. Please add some to `UserData\CustomItems\`

BONELAB.error: No Melon files found. Please add some to `UserData\CustomItems\`

BONELAB.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ModioModNetworker] \[ERROR] AUTH TOKEN NOT FOUND IN auth.txt.
BONELAB.error: Not signed into mod.io. Please open ModioModNetworker/auth.txt for instructions on how to sign in.

BONELAB.regex: \[[\d.:]+] \[ModioModNetworker] \[ERROR] The AUTH TOKEN in auth.txt is invalid. AKA. It is not correct. It is probably the key.
BONELAB.error: Failed to signed into mod.io. Please open ModioModNetworker/auth.txt and make sure to use the token and not the key.

ChilloutVR.error: CVRLogger is printing an error line but it is most likely thrown by CVR.

ChilloutVR.regex: .*Unable to set profile picture.*404 Not Found
ChilloutVR.error: Failed to download a profile picture from ABI servers. Default was used and no action needs to be taken.

Demeo.regex: HouseRules.*Could not load file or assembly 'Newtonsoft.*
Demeo.error: Missing Newtonsoft. Please make sure to extract the entire HouseRules zip.

TheLongDark.regex: \[[\d.:]+] System.ArgumentException: Could not load 'GEAR_TarpSheet' referenced by 'GEAR_Tent'.

modSpecificErrors.VRChat-TokenStealer-Doxer-IPGrabber-Avat: Do I seriously need to explain to you why<:Natsuki_Facepalm:828070877978951681>? Maybe take a look at [this](https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ) and reevaluate your life choices.
modSpecificErrors.Gurren Core: Gurren Core is no longer needed and should be removed from the mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.NKHook6: NKHook6 is broken and should be removed from the mods folder.
modSpecificErrors.GoldVillage: GoldVillage takes a long time to load on start, it may look like your game is crashing/freezing, but you just need to wait.
modSpecificErrors.TSG Village: GoldVillage takes a long time to load on start, it may look like your game is crashing/freezing, but you just need to wait.
modSpecificErrors.Custom Items Framework: Please replace Custom Items Framework with [ModThatIsNotMod](https://boneworks.thunderstore.io/package/gnonme/ModThatIsNotMod/).
